data.title: Conjure One - Sleep (Bleed the Dream Mix) by Libby Shimmz
data.meta_description: Stream Conjure One - Sleep (Bleed the Dream Mix) by Libby Shimmz on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2024-06-02T17:27:45Z

The final track on an upcoming album called 'death is just like falling asleep forever.' FL has the ability to separate stems from pre-recorded music tracks now, so I took its Ai to one of my favorite chillout mixes and fucked around with the acapella that it spit out. I went hardcore on the pitch shifting too. Sliced, diced, mixed, and switched the words around until some were unrecognizable. I then added some gritty 2step drums, some dialogue samples, and some plain old flavor at points. Story-wise, there are some gothy, vampy vibes on this one. A tale of a girl who pines for a vampire. I really like dark subject matter, so whether or not she makes it out alive is up for you to decide. I am but a humble storyteller. You can interpret this in whatever way you'd like. I really like how this turned out, but it sounds like shit on my JBL Charge 5. I'd definitely recommend headphones or a good stereo system when you listen to this. As always, thoughts are encouraged. Please leave your honest opinion!

Genre

Trip Hop
